casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Christopher BURGOS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 29, 2017

Richard Emanuel, in support of the petition.

James M. Ralls, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 501, 155 A.3d 246 (2017), is denied.
